features: 🎁 【 2024 Creative Gift 】 Cute and small thermal printer loved by users of all ages, M02L mini printer is the ideal gift for students, office workers, couples, friends and family

🎁【 Free APP 】 All the functions of the APP are free, provide 2500+ materials for free, you can always find the favorite pattern, every 2 weeks to update the new pattern, Infinite fun bluetooth printer, 👉TIP:Please connect Bluetooth within APP,NOT in the settings with the phone

🎁【 Easy to Use 】 Step 1: Install the APP, you can use it without registration. Step 2: Connect the mini printer Bluetooth in the APP. Step 3: Start enjoying one-click printing. Even a 3-year-old can print in 3 min, very friendly to new users
🎁【 Portable Printer 】 Mini sticker printer (152g), simple appearance, make the mini pocket printer feel good, easy to carry, print anytime and anywhere
🎁【 Inkless Printer 】 M02L thermal printer no ink or toner, greener and saves money. inkless note printer included: White Non-Adhesive Paper 1 roll (53MMx3.5M).
🎁【 Multi-Purpose Sticker Printer 】 M02L sticker maker printing width :2"/53MM, easily meet all kinds of printing needs: label/diary/scrapbook/web page /1D/QR code/photo...

🎁【 NO-Worry Mini Printer 】 rounded border design, no need to worry about the use of the process caused by bump. Provide 24 months free replacement of sticker printer, lifetime service, save your worry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun little gadget!
reviews.reviewText: My oldest is Autistic and one of his obsessions that comes and goes is printing pictures. We have gone through 2 instant print cameras, and he loves them but the film gets expensive fast.My husband saw this and we decided to give it as a Christmas present. My son LOVES it. So far we have only used the non-adhesive paper but I am very impressed with the print quality. It isn't perfect by any means, but you can tell who the person in the picture is and it helps cut down on him wanting to go to the big box store to print as often.It does a good job of printing lists as well.It is easy to figure out. I did have to google to figure out which app I had to download for it, but not a big deal. He uses my phone mostly to print, but can also use his iPad. He figured out how to print and edit pictures (crop, lighten, etc.) on his own fairly quickly.Overall would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This works really well for what I bought it for. I need to tape QR codes on my packages for easy returns. Super simple, and super easy to operate. Just download the app and print

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Black thermal printer - easy way to make thin bookmarks
reviews.reviewText: I just got this and so far I have been using it to make fun / thin /cute bookmarks for friends a family. As my photo shows, increasing contrast and adjusting brightness can really make a difference.I got it with 6 rolls of plain paper figuring I can order sticker / adhesive paper if I decide I want to make stickers with it, given the limited lifespan of things printed on a thermal printer I hesitate to use it for journaling - but it would be convenient for place labels in a travel journal.It works with the phomemo App, it comes up as M02L and connecting via Bluetooth was a snap.Overall, glad I picked this up, having fun with it and getting good use out of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great, it doesn't come with adhesive but I knew that and ordered it to go with

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Looked cute, but it doesn't print properly.
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't print properly, has gaps in the labels being printed, have printed other things just to see if it's my labels, however it's done the same thing on all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's a good idea
reviews.reviewText: Overall this is a cute idea. For the price I probably wouldn't have purchased if I had known more about it. It does come with 6 rolls of regular thermal paper. I believe you may need to adjust the black and white contrast settings. I really wanted to purchase this for making colored stickers and for printing quick note for college. However after a few uses I find that I do not bother using this for either of those. I have looked for additional sticker paper to achieve this goal and been unsuccessful. I plan to research it more in hopes of resolving these issues. Set up with super easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: works great and y’all show buy it😻 #STAN TWICE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars This is not a sticker making device.
reviews.reviewText: It came with a role of a simple thin paper and the printouts are very blurry. There is no adhesion. So disappointed. I feel cheated

I thought it is sticker. Oh, now I see it’s non stick paper. But the description seem to be misleading. Or am I just don’t understand English or too careless in reading. 😁 So, I have to use glue stick to stick it in by bullet journal. A bit Disappointed.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product - the manufacturer's app less so
reviews.reviewText: Got this as a present for a tween, with no real expectations. The logic was that being able to print selfies and other images that kids can share with their friends, on the fly, would be something neat. My kid loved it! The printer is very compact, which is great. When using it for the first time, finding out how to open it to install the paper roll is very tricky, as there are almost no markings or text on the case. The main problem is that the included instructions are poorly written and not comprehensive at all, so there is definitely a fair learning curve involved!The second problem is that the app needed to use the printer is not terribly polished, not to mention that the instructions don't mention how to obtain it... I believe the developers meant for users to read the printer's manual using the app, but I was unable to actually access the manual, after clicking many times on the corresponding menu in the app. The app works but it feels like it isn't quite finished yet.Thankfully, printing images from the phone or the web is straightforward and works. The first time printing, nothing showed up on the paper, so after a few tries, I realized that I inserted the paper with the printing side facing the wrong way. Once this was fixed, printing was fast and of fairly good quality.I like that the printer comes with lots of paper rolls, which allows beginner users to play with the various features and explore how to use the printer. Once I was comfortable with it, I gave a brief tutorial to my child and they were able to get going right away. Pairing the printer to a phone via Bluetooth was easy and fast, **but** it had to be done through the app itself, and location access is required (??)All in all, this is a decent product, much better on the hardware side than the software , but usable, after a while exploring and trialing. The app could be better and the included manual is of extremely limited value, so if you are not a patient/curious kind of person, you may want to look elsewhere. This product has a notable learning curve! IF a better app was available, it would be a great buy.

It is a good printer. It is easy to use. It comes with 6 paper rolls. Anything can be printed easily by connecting to app and bluetooth. There are templates in the app for business card and items on internet can be browsed. Print quality is good. It is small, light and portable.

This mini printer is so cute! It was super easy to use and the instructions were really clear.The color is so nice and it's so easy to use. The app is great there are so many different options to print off or add your own picture and print. The quality is really good when it comes out and I love that it has sticker paper so cool!Great for a gift or stocking stuffer !
